title: Bridge inspections lead to temporary I-95 lane closures
title_page: Bridge inspections lead to temporary I-95 lane closures
maintext:
NORTH HAMPTON, N.H. (AP) — Drivers along Interstate 95 from Seabrook to North Hampton will experience temporary lane closures because of planned bridge inspections, New Hampshire’s Department of Transportation said.
The work is scheduled to be done between 8 a.m. and 3 p.m. from Monday, April 20, through Friday, April 24. Northbound and southbound lanes will be affected.
Drivers are advised to reduce speeds and follow signs, message boards, and traffic cones through the work zone.
This work will also include temporary closures of the Open Road Toll lanes at the Hampton tolls.
